name: Code a Pookalam - Media File
description: Code-a-pookkalam was an initiative started by TinkerHub RIT Campus Community, Kottayam in 2017. The idea was to bring together art and code to introduce programming to all. Code-a-pookkalam has then been replicated & conducted in a few other TinkerHub Campus Communities as well every year since then. Because it was hugely successful in terms of enthusiasm and participation, we thought it would be a great idea to organise and open it as an event for all this year.
